alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 9:14PM EDT until April 26 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Polk County in central Florida... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 913 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Wales, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Wales, Crooked Lake Park, Frostproof, Hillcrest Heights, Highland Park, Indian Lake Estates, Lake Wales Municipal Airport, Babson Park, and Waverly. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
